title: FT: T3 Tinker and Crawford for T206
author: DerekMichael

posts.post_title: FT: T3 Tinker and Crawford for T206
posts.post_content:
Hello All.

I have available for trade two decent looking T3 Turkey Red cards featuring Hall of Fame players Joe Tinker and Sam Crawford.

I would like to trade them for T206. My interests would lie in cool players and cool advertising backs.

If you feel you might have a match, feel free to PM me and I will be happy to try and work something out with you.

Thank You!

Derek

Hi all. I would like to "bump" this thread. I have had some nice discussions, but I am still looking for that perfect match :)

Thanks!

Derek

Crawford has been traded. Tinker still available. Thank you very much.

Derek

Hey guys. I just wanted to bump this one and see if anyone was interested in the Tinker.

You can just shoot me a PM.

Thank you.

Derek

Why the Auth grade on the Tinker - Is it short? Looks pretty clean.

K

I am actually not 100% sure, but take a good look at the bottom right edge ... possible trim?

Just for the record, whatever the alteration, it was not done by me!!!

Thank you for your interest.

Derek
